lessons.title: Planning the Weekend
lessons.content:
Mike: Hey, Sarah! Do you have any plans for this weekend?
Sarah: Hi, Mike. Not really. I might just stay home and read some books. What about you?
Mike: My dad and I are going fishing at the lake on Saturday. Do you want to come with us?
Sarah: Fishing? I have never been fishing before. Is it difficult?
Mike: No, it's easy! I can teach you. You just need to be patient and wait for the fish to bite.
Sarah: That sounds interesting. What do we need to bring?
Mike: Just bring a hat and some snacks. We have extra fishing rods. We will leave at 8 o'clock in the morning.
Sarah: Okay! I will ask my parents tonight. Thanks for inviting me!
Mike: You're welcome. It will be fun!
